API Reference

This page documents the fetchmd API for programmatic usage.

Installation

Install via npm:

npm install -g fetchmd

Usage

The simplest usage is to pass a URL as the first argument:

fetchmd https://example.com

You can also pipe HTML from stdin or read from a local file.

Programmatic API

Import the pipeline function for use in your own tools:

import { run } from "fetchmd/pipeline";
await run(["node", "fetchmd", "https://example.com"], true);

The pipeline function accepts injectable dependencies for testing purposes.

Each module can also be imported individually for custom workflows.
